title._content: [Private Reuben Goodson of Co. G, 52nd North Carolina Infantry Regiment in uniform]  (LOC)

description._content: [Private Reuben Goodson of Co. G, 52nd North Carolina Infantry Regiment in uniform] [between 1862 and 1864] 1 photograph : ninth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 7.5 x 6.2 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Notation inside case: R. Goodson. Case: Leather; octagon and scroll design. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. For more information see: (www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html) Photo shows identified soldier. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2012; (D066) Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Forms part of: Ambrotype/Tintype photograph filing series (Library of Congress). Subjects: Goodson, Reuben,--approximately 1841- Confederate States of America.--Army--North Carolina Infantry Regiment, 52nd--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.34376 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 3031
